name: Go For It
description:
Go For It is a simple game for up to 8 players.  Each time a token spawns randomly on the map, fly your ship over the token to collect it. The first player to collect 25 tokens wins.

Features:

  • Use the HUD indicator to find the token before your opponents.
  • A selection of maps from Meteor including the 2x2KM Woodlands map.
  • Single player (1 player vs computer).
  • Multiplayer network PVP up to 8 players.

This game was created using SFML.
